entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
